events.message: Applicant submitted the personal loan application online, stating the intended use for medical expenses and debt consolidation.
Loan application was categorized under Personal Loan based on mentioned medical and debt-related keywords.
A senior loan officer was assigned to the case to ensure thorough handling of the applicant’s personal loan request.
The loan officer conducted the initial review, verifying applicant eligibility and reviewing stated personal expense purposes.
Request sent for medical bills, proof of income, and recent bank statements to support the personal loan application.
Applicant submitted all requested documentation on time, including detailed hospital invoices and income statements.
Credit bureau report was retrieved and analyzed, indicating a moderate credit score with some previous debt obligations.
Risk analysis performed accounting for credit score and loan purpose; flagged some concerns related to past debts.
Loan offer presented to the applicant with competitive interest rates and flexible repayment terms for personal loan.
Applicant responded positively, requesting a slight adjustment in repayment schedule to better match monthly income.
Loan application was escalated to the senior credit committee due to requested adjustments in repayment terms.
Senior committee approved the loan with revised terms accommodating the applicant’s repayment preferences.
Personal loan funds were successfully disbursed to the applicant’s bank account for immediate use.
A follow-up call was conducted to ensure the applicant understands repayment schedule and available support options.
Loan application was officially closed after successful funding and confirmation of applicant satisfaction with terms.
